amendment.description: Amendment sought to require Energy Department laboratories to decrease their number of full-time employees by one-third over a period of five years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of October 10 as amendment NO. 13, to require Energy Department laboratories to decrease their number of full-time employees by one-third over a period of five years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 286 (Roll no. 704).
